Supreme Court won't take up challenge to Jack Smith's Trump Twitter data access  —  The Supreme Court on Monday declined to take up a challenge by social media platform X, formerly known as Twitter, to court rulings that forced the platform to turn over data on former President Trump's account to special counsel Jack Smith.

Scandal-plagued Deputy Mayor Phil Banks, close Adams friend, resigns  —  Scandal-plagued Deputy Mayor for Public Safety Phil Banks has resigned, succumbing to weeks of pressure amid federal probes that ensnared both him and his longtime friend Mayor Eric Adams, sources told The Post.
